summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the acceptance of a grant from the Federal Emergency Management Agency, United States Government, Division of Labor-management Grant Program through an agreement with the Washington State Military Department for seismic upgrades to Fire Station 2 and Fire Station 18, increasing expenditure allowances of the Executive Services Department, making a supplemental appropriation from the Emergency Subfund, transferring funds from the Cumulative Reserve Fund Subfund, authorizing deposit of grant funds into the Cumulative Reserve Subfund, and declaring an emergency therefor; all by a three fourths vote of the City Council.
